mainText:
There are no words,
No lamentations,
Nothing that can convey
...the loss the pain.

There is always joy,
Always innovation,
A forever feeling of awe and wonder.

Inspiration, passion and courage to build a dream, that is what you have 
taught me.

THANK YOU

Steve will be remembered as one of the giants of creative genius. Like 
Henson, like Lennon, he has gone too soon.

Apple has changed my life.
author: Mike
